meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels show 02271.1 (first five digits 02271 are whole, the sixth digit 1 is tenths). The red needle is past the 0.03 mark and very close to the 0.04 mark on the circular dial, rounded to 0.04 for hundredths. The '0' on the dial is implied at the 12 o'clock position (0 degrees), so 0.04 corresponds to 144 degrees clockwise.
